name: Intap Labs Pvt. Ltd.
description: Provider of a cloud-based platform intended to offer language and culture learning services. The company's platform offers an application software which hosts intuitive audio-visual language, lessons and practice widgets in different languages, enabling learners to build their English vocabulary and in other languages.
one_liner: Provider of a cloud-based platform intended to offer language and culture learning services. The company's platform offers an application software which hosts intuitive audio-visual language, lessons and practice widgets in different languages, enabling learners to build their English vocabulary and in other languages.
